mapper.select: select MASTER_SEQ as idx, MASTER_TITLE as name, PAGE_URL as code from tbl_goods_master where PAGE_URL like '%NDcw%' OR PAGE_URL like '%NTk4%' OR PAGE_URL like '%NzMx%' OR PAGE_URL like '%MjIy%' OR PAGE_URL like '%ODY0%'
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_information (delim, uDate, pageCode, pagePath, pageviews, uniquePageviews, sessions, bounces, totalEvents, entrances) values ('G', #{uDate}, #{pageCode}, #{pagePath}, #{pageviews}, #{uniquePageviews}, #{sessions}, #{bounces}, #{totalEvents}, #{entrances})
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_information where delim = 'G' AND uDate = #{uDate} AND pagePath = #{pagePath}
mapper.select: select pageCode, sum(pageviews) as pageviews, sum(uniquePageviews) as uniquePageviews, sum(sessions) as sessions, sum(bounces) as bounces, sum(totalEvents) as totalEvents, sum(entrances) as entrances from tbl_information where delim='G' AND pageCode = #{seq} AND uDate >= #{startDate} AND uDate <= #{endDate} group by pageCode
select MASTER_TITLE as name from tbl_goods_master where MASTER_SEQ = #{code}
